name: Spotify Search
plugin_instructions:
STEP 1

For authorization you need to use the client credentials flow. Retrieve your client id and client from: https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization-guide/#client-credentials-flow

STEP 2

Use your client id and client secret to create a string in the following format, as specified in the Spotify docs:

Basic <base64 encoded client_id:client_secret>

Do it yourself or a use a tool like: https://www.blitter.se/utils/basic-authentication-header-generator/

STEP 3

Copy the value and paste it into the 'Authorization' field in the plugin settings. Note that you only need the second part of the string if you used the tool in the previous step (Basic YXNkOnF3ZQ== and NOT Authorization: Basic YXNkOnF3ZQ==)

Step 4

Use the plugin! In bubble you should now find the actions under 'Plugins' in any workflow.
